import React from 'react' import StarIcon from "../assets/icons/star.svg" import courseData from "../data/courseData" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const linkStyle = { textDecoration: 'none', color: 'inherit', display: 'block', width: 'auto' }; function Courses(props) { return ( <>

{props.course_title}

See All
    {courseData.map((course) => (

  • {course.title}

    {course.instructor}
    ({course.ratings})

    {course.total_hours} Total Hours. {course.no_of_lectures} Lectures. {course.level}

    ${course.price}

    • ))}
) } export default Courses
